thread.title: very central location, comfortable and efficient room
thread.title_full: very central location, comfortable and efficient room - Review of The Piccadilly London West End, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sarah K
title: very central location, comfortable and efficient room
text: I chose this hotel based on price/location. It is extremely central--piccadillly circus, oxford circus etc all just a few minutes away. I arrived early and was given my room, which was nice as I had flown all night before. Everything was comfortable, and the staff was kind. I did not use the restaurant (although I did drink the prosecco offered to me on arrival!). Room was not huge, but was more than adequate for one and would be okay for two. Nice lighting, bathrooms, etc. I didn't notice noise, even though it is a busy neighborhood. I would stay here again if I wanted to be in this location.
